snippet.title: Knight Lore Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, Knight Lore. From the recording originally sent to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ . Here's a walkthrough of a graphics modded version from 2002 by Mick Farrow: http://youtu.be/0qa-WBuXKlU . And a 128K modded version can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=esQ_QlCK0Us

Recorded using "rollback", a feature of the emulator which allows you to mark a point, which you can then roll back to later if you get into difficulty, and try again. More info. on the channel "About" page: https://www.youtube.com/user/rzxarchive/about

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #KnightLore
